description: This source file defines the NotesApp class, which extends Android's Application class and serves as the application-level class for the Notes app. It provides a place to initialize global application state, particularly related to providing a singleton NotesDatabase instance, though in this implementation, the onCreate method currently performs no explicit initialization.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: An Android Application class that serves as a singleton provider for the NotesDatabase, currently only calling the superclass's onCreate method without additional logic.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Overrides the onCreate method of Application to perform initialization when the app starts; currently a no-op with a comment indicating lazy initialization of the database.
